content.rendered:
Joydeep Dutta has an MBA from University of Sunderland and a Masters in Gender studies from University of Sussex. He also has a Professional diploma in International health management. He is an associate lecturer at Regent College London. His responsibilities are facilitating and assessing learning in the School of Allied Health. He has currently facilitating learning in BSc in Health and social care with Foundation.

Research papers and Publications

He has published a research paper titles “BME in Higher Education and Social Justice”.
